personalities: Very Frail, Smart, Nimble / Frail, Tender, Very Smart
sets.detail:
200 Ranged Attack with Smart / V Smart is to hit as hard as possible 
 200 Speed is to be as fast as possible, with Nimble it outspeeds Nimble Tyrecks, without Nimble it outspeeds 184 Nimble Searknight 
 52 Energy = 256 Energy at level 50 for (2 Nova Blasts + 3 Metal Blasts + 1 Magnify) 
 48 HP is leftovers
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 200 HP, 20 Enl, 200 R Atk. 56 R Def, 24 Sp
sets.detail:
20 Energy allows for 250 Energy at level 50 
 24 Speed + Sluggish allows to speed tie Swolder 
 200 HP to maximise general bulk 
 56 Ranged Defense leftovers
sets.author: Kanku
